about_the_game: This is an episodic game and is the second episode of this season. The story follows after the events in episode 1. Alex Summer (Shadow) goes to Victer Sergey's warehouse to take revenge. Your job is to kill Victer and his bodygourds. You can use the mouse pointer to aim and click the mouse button to shoot. The up arrow key can be used to go forward. You can use the mouse to turn left and right.
